text:
@SenSchumer Its May 14th and YOU allowed Gov Cuomo to
MURDER thousands of  vulnerable elderly nursing homes residents by MANDATING they accept recovering Coronavirus patients 
YOU & Gov Cuomo have the
BLOOD of those who DIED on your hands
